step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_IX_POINTADDRESS (PID) (SELECT PID FROM IX_POINTADDRESS WHERE MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_IX_POINTADDRESS (PID) (SELECT PID FROM IX_POINTADDRESS WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT I.GUIDE_LINK_PID FROM IX_POINTADDRESS I,TEMP_FILTER_IX_POINTADDRESS T WHERE I.PID=T.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS (PID) (SELECT /*+ ORDERED USE_HASH(P) USE_HASH(C) NO_SWAP_JOIN_INPUTS(C)*/ C.CHILD_PA_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_IX_POINTADDRESS T, IX_POINTADDRESS_PARENT P, IX_POINTADDRESS_CHILDREN C WHERE P.GROUP_ID = C.GROUP_ID AND P.PARENT_PA_PID = T.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS (PID) (SELECT /*+ ORDERED USE_HASH(C) USE_HASH(P) NO_SWAP_JOIN_INPUTS(P)*/ P.PARENT_PA_PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_IX_POINTADDRESS T, IX_POINTADDRESS_CHILDREN C, IX_POINTADDRESS_PARENT P WHERE P.GROUP_ID = C.GROUP_ID AND C.CHILD_PA_PID = T.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS (PID) (SELECT P.PID FROM IX_POINTADDRESS P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK L WHERE P.LOCATE_LINK_PID=L.PID union all SELECT P.PID FROM IX_POINTADDRESS P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK L WHERE P.GUIDE_LINK_PID=L.PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS (PID) (SELECT P.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_IX_POINTADDRESS P);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS_GROUP (PID) ( SELECT DISTINCT P.GROUP_ID FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_PARENT P, TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS T WHERE P.PARENT_PA_PID = T.PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS_GROUP (PID) ( SELECT DISTINCT P.GROUP_ID FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_CHILDREN P, TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS T WHERE P.CHILD_PA_PID = T.PID );
DELETE FROM TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS T WHERE T.PID IN (SELECT PID FROM IX_POINTADDRESS P WHERE P.GUIDE_LINK_PID NOT IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK));
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POINTADDRESS P,TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_FLAG P,TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_NAME P,TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_NAME_TONE P,(SELECT P.NAME_ID FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_NAME P,TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS T WHERE P.PID=T.PID) T WHERE P.NAME_ID=T.NAME_ID;
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_PARENT P,TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS_GROUP T WHERE P.GROUP_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_CHILDREN P,TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS_GROUP T WHERE P.GROUP_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_CHILDREN P,TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS T WHERE P.CHILD_PA_PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM IX_POINTADDRESS P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS T );
DELETE FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_FLAG P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS T );
DELETE FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_NAME P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS T );
DELETE FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_NAME_TONE P WHERE P.NAME_ID IN (SELECT P.NAME_ID FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_NAME P, TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS T WHERE P.PID = T.PID) ;
DELETE FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_PARENT P WHERE P.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS_GROUP T );
DELETE FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_CHILDREN P WHERE P.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS_GROUP T );
DELETE FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_CHILDREN P WHERE P.CHILD_PA_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS SELECT PID FROM IX_POINTADDRESS A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM IX_POINTADDRESS B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_POINTADDRESS_GROUP SELECT GROUP_ID FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_PARENT A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM IX_POINTADDRESS_PARENT B WHERE A.GROUP_ID = B.GROUP_ID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_HAMLET (PID) (SELECT PID FROM IX_HAMLET WHERE MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_HAMLET (PID) (SELECT PID FROM IX_HAMLET WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT I.LINK_PID FROM IX_HAMLET I,TEMP_IX_HAMLET T WHERE I.PID=T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_HAMLET (PID) (SELECT P.PID FROM IX_HAMLET P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK L WHERE P.LINK_PID=L.PID );
DELETE FROM TEMP_IX_HAMLET T WHERE T.PID IN (SELECT PID FROM IX_HAMLET P WHERE P.LINK_PID NOT IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK));
SELECT P.* FROM IX_HAMLET P,TEMP_IX_HAMLET T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM IX_HAMLET_NAME P,TEMP_IX_HAMLET T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM IX_HAMLET_NAME_TONE P,(SELECT P.NAME_ID FROM IX_HAMLET_NAME P,TEMP_IX_HAMLET T WHERE P.PID=T.PID) T WHERE P.NAME_ID=T.NAME_ID;
SELECT P.* FROM IX_HAMLET_FLAG P,TEMP_IX_HAMLET T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM IX_HAMLET P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_HAMLET T );
DELETE FROM IX_HAMLET_NAME P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_HAMLET T );
DELETE FROM IX_HAMLET_FLAG P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_HAMLET T );
DELETE FROM IX_HAMLET_NAME_TONE P WHERE P.NAME_ID IN (SELECT P.NAME_ID FROM IX_HAMLET_NAME P, TEMP_IX_HAMLET T WHERE P.PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_HAMLET SELECT PID FROM IX_HAMLET A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM IX_HAMLET B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM IX_IC P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh];
SELECT P.* FROM IX_IC P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE';
DELETE FROM IX_IC P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh];
DELETE FROM IX_IC P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE';
DELETE FROM IX_IC A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM IX_IC B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM IX_CROSSPOINT P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh];
SELECT P.* FROM IX_CROSSPOINT P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE';
DELETE FROM IX_CROSSPOINT P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh];
DELETE FROM IX_CROSSPOINT P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE';
DELETE FROM IX_CROSSPOINT A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM IX_CROSSPOINT B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM IX_TOLLGATE P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh];
SELECT P.* FROM IX_TOLLGATE P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE';
DELETE FROM IX_TOLLGATE P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh];
DELETE FROM IX_TOLLGATE P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE';
DELETE FROM IX_TOLLGATE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM IX_TOLLGATE B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM IX_ROADNAME P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh];
SELECT P.* FROM IX_ROADNAME P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE';
DELETE FROM IX_ROADNAME P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh];
DELETE FROM IX_ROADNAME P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE';
DELETE FROM IX_ROADNAME A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM IX_ROADNAME B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POSTCODE P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh];
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POSTCODE P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE';
DELETE FROM IX_POSTCODE P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh];
DELETE FROM IX_POSTCODE P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE';
DELETE FROM IX_POSTCODE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM IX_POSTCODE B WHERE A.POST_ID = B.POST_ID);
